column5: Antiques, Old Fashioned Home, Homey atmosphere with character, Wi-Fi, Wood Stove. Walking distance to town square and the river. Two city parks on the river all just a short walk. I am in and out all day doing kayak trips up and down the river, if my guest want to do a kayak trip for a fee, that can be arranged through me.
column8: ZENO'S PLACE IN LLANO, THE RED ROOM
